title: Band, 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen, silk
Technique: plain weave embroidered with counted stitch: long-armed cross
description: Cream-colored band embroidered in red with the motto "Liberta" contained in a diagonal-shaped scroll. Stylized leaves and acorns appear in between scrolls..

tombstone.epitaph:
Band, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: linen, silk
Technique: plain weave embroidered with counted stitch: long-armed cross. Bequest of Marian Hague. 1971-50-92.
